D. D. An advertisement, anent the reading of the books of Antonia Borignion By George White minister at Mary-Culter near Aberdeen. White, George, d. 1724.
[8], 96 p.
printed by John Forbes, printer to the town and University, Aberdeen ; Anno Dom. 1700.
A1 is blank but for black-letter signature on recto. With a preliminary index leaf. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
